entry.title: Miguel joins the Department of Biochemistry

link.title: Miguel joins the Department of Biochemistry

entry.content: Miguel Joined the Department of Biochemistry of the School of Sciences, UNAM, as an Assistant Professor (Profesor Asociado C, TC) on June 1st 2023
entry.summary: Miguel Joined the Department of Biochemistry of the School of Sciences, UNAM, as an Assistant Professor (Profesor Asociado C, TC) on June 1st 2023
